DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect hypercapnia hemodynamics cerebral oxygenation shoulder arthroscopy .
DOC.detailed_description: The patient randomly allocate receive normocapnia hypercapnia . After 70ยบ sit position , record mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) , heart rate , regional oxygen saturation ( rSO2 ) .
DOC.criteria: patient undergo elective shoulder arthroscopic surgery history age > 65 year , morbidly obesity ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) , diffuse lung disease , uncontrolled systemic hypertension , intracranial disease , cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease .
